title: To-Do-List App
description: This to-do list app is a sleek and interactive tool that simplifies task management with dynamic backgrounds, showcasing my web development skills.

title: Static e-Commerce Website
description: This project is a responsive e-commerce site for electronics, with features like carousels, a shopping cart, and user login, using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and SwiperJS.

title: Weather-App
description: Discover real-time weather insights with our interactive weather app, seamlessly blending precision forecasts and vibrant visuals to bring the climate of any city right to your fingertips.
